name: SendEmailReport
description: Send rich email report for your test results and for tasks in this stage
helpMarkDown: Sets 'EmailReportTask.EmailSent' variable to true if it sent email successfully.
author: Aakash Ravi

inputs.name: sendMailConditionConfig
inputs.label: Send Email
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sends email if the selected criteria is met.

inputs.name: includeInToSectionStr
inputs.label: Include in To Section
inputs.helpMarkDown: Adds the selected users in To section.

inputs.name: toAddress
inputs.label: To
inputs.helpMarkDown: Recipients email addresses separated by semicolon(;).

inputs.name: includeInCcSectionStr
inputs.label: Include in Cc Section
inputs.helpMarkDown: Adds the selected users in Cc section.

inputs.name: ccAddress
inputs.label: Cc
inputs.helpMarkDown: Recipients email addresses separated by semicolon(;).

inputs.name: defaultDomain
inputs.label: Default Domain for Addresses
inputs.helpMarkDown: Address Domains like microsoft.com. Will be used to resolve mail addresses. testOwner@domain for example.

inputs.name: fromEmail
inputs.label: From Email
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the sender email address for the report.

inputs.name: groupTestSummaryByStr
inputs.label: Group Test Summary
inputs.helpMarkDown: Adds test summary groups for the selected configurations.

inputs.name: includeResultsStr
inputs.label: Include Test Results
inputs.helpMarkDown: Include test result details for the selected types.

inputs.name: groupTestResultsBy
inputs.label: Group Test Results
inputs.helpMarkDown: Group test results by the selected criteria.

inputs.name: includeCommits
inputs.label: Include Commits
inputs.helpMarkDown: Includes new commits since last completed release.

inputs.name: maxTestFailuresToShow
inputs.label: Maximum Test Results to show
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum test failures to show in the report. Additional tests will be truncated.

inputs.name: includeOthersInTotal
inputs.label: Include Others in Total count
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set, Total count will include others and pass percentage will be calculated accordingly.

inputs.name: usePreviousEnvironment
inputs.label: Use Previous Stage
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set, email content will be generated for the previous stage in the current release.

inputs.name: enableSSLOnSmtpConnection
inputs.label: Enable TLS
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enables TLS on SMTP Connection for sending email.

inputs.name: smtpConnectionEndpoint
inputs.label: SMTP credentials
inputs.helpMarkDown: SMTP credentials to be used to send email report
